title: Dairy-Free Vegetarian 'Chicken' Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 block (14 oz) firm tofu, pressed and cubed
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp soy sauce, nutritional yeast, and cornstarch. Add the tofu and toss to coat. Let marinate for 15 minutes.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes. Remove tofu from skillet and set aside.
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3-5 minutes. Add broccoli and snow peas and cook for another 2-3 minutes.

Return tofu to the skillet. In a small bowl, whisk together vegetable broth, 2 tbsp soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil. Pour over vegetables and tofu. Cook until sauce thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
description: A flavorful and satisfying vegetarian stir-fry with crispy tofu, vibrant vegetables, and a savory sauce, offering a 'cheesy' element thanks to nutritional yeast. This dish skillfully incorporates the requested 'chicken' and 'cheese' elements in a vegetarian and dairy-free manner, while adhering to the no nuts/berries restriction.
